directions.step:
Prepare Gorton's Crunchy Fish Fillets as the package directs. Meanwhile, grill or broil onion, brushing with 2 tbsp barbecue sauce, until golden.
For each sandwich, spread the bottom half of each roll with the remaining 2 tbsp of barbecue sauce blended with mayonnaise.
Top each with 1 hot crunchy fish fillet, tomato slices, grilled onion slices and lettuce.
Try using wooden toothpicks to hold it together while you slice each sandwich in half.
